gameDetails.description:
This set includes four new Survivors for Zombicide: Black Plague, designed by Paul Bonner.  The four new survivors include:
Inquisitor Mizar
Genevieve
Lord Bazak
Klom

Paul Bonner, a Yorkshire â€‹born Englishman, has lived in Copenhagen since the early ‘90s. After earning his degree in Illustration at the Harrow College of Art, he illustrated many children’s books on a freelance basisâ€‹ in Londonâ€‹, then spent three years with the Games Workshop Design Studio. After moving to Denmark, he continued his relationship with Games Workshop, and also contributed to such titles as Mutant Chronicles, Rackham’s Confrontation, Shadowrunâ€‹ and Riotmindsâ€‹.
